definition: (of an elderly couple) husband or wife

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
erhua variant of 老伴[lao3 ban4]

sentences.english: There his wife was baking chocolate chip cookies.
sentences.chinese: 他老伴正在做巧克力块曲奇。

sentences.english: The landlord banged on the door and turned the handle. The door was locked.
sentences.chinese: 旅馆老伴使劲擂门，并转动门把手，门是锁着的。

sentences.english: In 1996, Zheng Changye and his wife both retired.
I will practice the tune home sing to hear.
sentences.chinese: 我要练好这支曲子，回家唱给老伴听。

sentences.english: Your spouse won’t stand for it.
sentences.chinese: 你的老伴儿也不会让你去。

sentences.english: Li Chang worried most about his wife who was also working in the Ministry of Public Security.
sentences.chinese: 李昌说，他那时最担心的，是同在公安部工作的老伴。

sentences.english: He and his wife, Ge Nianjiu, 67, moved in last month.
sentences.chinese: 他和他67岁的老伴儿葛年军上个月搬进来的。

sentences.english: This was the third day he and his wife had spent in parks, looking.
sentences.chinese: 这是他和老伴来公园找儿媳妇的第三天了。

sentences.english: " Look at his wife a bit off, " exactly what the, ah?
sentences.chinese: 看着老伴有点失常，“到底咋地啦，啊？

sentences.english: Mother Hucheloup, his wife, was a bearded and a very homely creature.
sentences.chinese: 他的老伴于什鲁大妈是个生着胡子模样儿怪丑的妇人。

sentences.english: Li Chang said that his wife would visit him every month.
sentences.chinese: 李昌说老伴每月都来看他，上个星期还刚来过。

sentences.english: Huang mother-in-law and his wife immediately stubbornly cling to men, also asked to necklaces .
sentences.chinese: 黄婆婆和老伴立即死死抱住男子，要求还回项链。

sentences.english: His wife's death nearly finished Thompson too.
sentences.chinese: 老伴一死，汤普森差点儿随她而去。

sentences.english: Finally, he has fallen out with his wife today.
sentences.chinese: 今天他终于和老伴吵翻了。

sentences.english: And on a winter night he went out alone when his wife was asleep .
sentences.chinese: 一个冬夜，他趁老伴睡着时独自出了门。

definition: erhua variant of 老伴[lao3 ban4]
old man or woman/the elderly/one's aged parents or grandparents
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
(coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
uncle (polite form of address for older male)
